refnamediv.refpurpose: Name of the glossary collection file

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Tired of manually maintaining glossaries for multiple documents? Now you can maintain a central glossary and let the stylesheets do the copying for you. This parameter identifies the file (by URI reference) that contains your complete glossary collection.
